        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="42702" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="42702" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.11</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="493">493</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="58"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Savoy Steam</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. <b>Savoy Steam</b> was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Juliette Karagueuzoglou. Top notes are Eucalyptus, Rosemary, Pink Pepper, Mint, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Rose, Tea, Geranium, Hedione and Cardamom; base notes are White Musk, Vanilla, Benzoin and Incense. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html"                         <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">11</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Boring and weak fragrance for some
                </div>

class="linkrg"><span title="/board/register.php" class="rtg">Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263186" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 21:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Savoy Steam<br />
(Store test)<br />
<br />
Airy aromatic fragrance that build on Eucalyptus, Rose and end with powdery amber.<br />
I like how airy this is, clean. I think this is soft Fougere and steam airy rose.<br />
<br />
Lite classic, Would love to wear this in Resort city.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2263186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2263186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Imagine eating raw ginger</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2234745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2234745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233390" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233390" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Skipcon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Skipcon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Absolute-43040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Absolute"title="Gucci Guilty Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791">Skipcon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 01:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Floral, rose, herbaceous like smell. <br />
<br />
I get a big hit of rosemary and rose, with the rosemary persisting in the drydown. To me it does give a brilliant representation of what 'steam' would smell like. <br />
<br />
The geranium I feel gives it a spa like feel, but isn't fleeting like a lot of other scents in this category. <br />
<br />
This is quite a unique concoction to be honest and does what it says on the tin. The fragrance has been described as one that is meant to represent the 'turkish baths'. <br />
<br />
Projection and longevity aren't amazing but acceptable. <br />
<br />
4/5 for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2233390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2233390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2223546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223546" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brown Frag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brown Frag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191663">Brown Frag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 13:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Maybe my favourite summer fragrance of all time. Such a fresh scent. I can only describe it as the cleanest smell you will ever have. Its also extremely unique, i've never smelled anything like it! Need me another one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2223546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2223546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222228" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222228" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gbvfx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="gbvfx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222228ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222228" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406062">gbvfx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a unique scent, never smelt anything like this. Super addictive with a fizzy quality that reminds me of Dr.Pepper (I think). Clean and sexy on the dry down</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2222228"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2222228#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205647" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205647ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205647" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103">Scent.guide</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-02">07/02/24 06:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely amazing aromatic fragrance with refreshing eucalyptus and thyme. It doesnt have mush of the some notes (which is a huge plus for me), but it definitely smells like a hammam or a nice sauna. For some it might smell slightly masculine due to spicy geranium, however, on me it doesnt project that much.<br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2205647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2205647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188072" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mistress S"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2165836"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mistress S" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2165836">Mistress S</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous fragrance!  Smells clean in a pharmaceutical way.  A freshly steamed and purified body, straight out of the Hammam, this scent lifts my soul.<br />
Am absolutely devastated that its been discontinued!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2188072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2188072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177870" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177870" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pocketfullofposies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479013.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pocketfullofposies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177870ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177870" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479013">pocketfullofposies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 11:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I picked this up based on the name - terrible I know - so I wasnt really sure what to expect. At first its very incense heavy which surprised me as I thought steam would equal light. It then had a slight medicinal scent which was rather pleasant and the incense turned to a spicy floral. The dry down was warming floral, very hard to describe but it felt rather comforting to me. Such a unique perfume, I havent experienced such a journey with a fragrance before.<br />
I was gutted when I saw it was discontinued and even contacted Penhaligons directly to see if it was true. Sadly they confirmed it was so I bought two bottles. A dire mistake to discontinue this fragrance! Its beautiful!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2177870"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2177870#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2075930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2075930" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="deslilas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1214397"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1214397.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="deslilas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Apres-l-Ondee-13.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Apres l'Ondee"title="Apres l'Ondee"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2075930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2075930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1214397">deslilas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-27">02/27/24 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wait, there's a "eau de cologne" of this as well? I wonder if that is as bad as this. I don't know why, but it just smelled awful on me. I got a spray from a perfume counter, and it just smelled like an abused rose. A rose that has been tortured and left for dead. It was sad, angering even, with no other notes coming out in any signifiant way. Extremely disappointing and even offensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2075930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2075930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055617" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2055617" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="qqcheeky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="qqcheeky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Omnia-Crystalline-152.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.152.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Omnia Crystalline"title="Omnia Crystalline"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2055617ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2055617" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321019">qqcheeky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 00:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive never left a review here before but here goes.<br />
<br />
It was summer and I was walking about London and stumbled into a Penhaligons store in Covent Garden. I never explored the house before and I thought Id walk in and smell some of the scents out of curiosity.<br />
<br />
I smelled quite a few of their signature scents that the sales woman suggested but nothing really spoke to me. I told her Im quite into more aromatic scents but I dont like when they lean too masculine. She suggested Savoy Steam and it was love at first sniff. I didnt expect to love it so much and even the sales person was surprised as Im assuming this scent is not very popular.<br />
<br />
She sprayed some on a handkerchief for me and I walked out and spent the next few days constantly looking for the handkerchief to smell it again and again.<br />
<br />
Anyways, 2 months later I bought it and now Im wondering if Ill ever find another fragrance as awesome as this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2055617"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2055617#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2026096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2026096" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LauraVTerrazas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1404949.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LauraVTerrazas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rihla-Eau-de-Parfum-66765.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66765.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rihla Eau de Parfum"title="Eau Rihla Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2026096ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2026096" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404949">LauraVTerrazas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 20:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my. The opening is gorgeous! You get green aromatics with cardamom and rose. After a few minutes it settles into a sweet, musky, clean scent (can't detect specific notes like I do in the opening). Definitely FBW and can be worn by anyone!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="2026096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=2026096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love this scent, so refined. A great rose gateway drug for men</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1891758"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1891758#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1876559" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1876559" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pingaparadise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701885"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pingaparadise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1876559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1876559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701885">pingaparadise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-11">07/11/23 17:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very clean fresh out the shower smell.<br />
The dry down of Savoy Steam reminds me so much of a very fragrant baby powder.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1876559"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1876559#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1856424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1856424" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SalinasL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SalinasL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Oscar-de-la-Renta/So-de-la-Renta-3261.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3261.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="So de la Renta"title="So de la Renta"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1856424ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1856424" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192461">SalinasL</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-14">06/14/23 17:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was looking forward to a camphorous minty bomb and got none of that. I got nothing but iris at first, then after a few minutes the iris powder morphed into a tea rose powder. I didnt dislike it, its just not what I wanted. Eucalyptus, mint, cardamom, incense... I thought it would be more like a traditional eastern, aromatic spa/herbal medicine (and the brand compares it to a heady and invigorating Turkish hammam), but instead it was nice contemporary hotel soap and linens. I made a second attempt later and it went straight to a horrible strong sour rose, so this one is just not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1856424"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1856424#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1812595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1812595" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pippingreen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1678988.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pippingreen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1812595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1812595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678988">pippingreen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-19">04/19/23 08:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get a steamy, herby, sweet rose scent with maybe a touch of bergamot initially. It's so well blended I can't pick out any of the herbs specifically except maybe a little of the mint. I love it for the spa-like feeling but the sample I tried before buying a FB was much more rosemary and eucalyptus forward.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1812595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1812595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1788513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1788513" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RawSmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1384192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RawSmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-EAUX-Primordiales/Champaca-Supercritique-49555.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49555.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Champaca Supercritique"title="Champaca Supercritique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1788513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1788513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192">RawSmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-20">03/20/23 18:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just sublime! The rose in here is just wonderfully blended into this concoction, yet retains the freshie essence, it's so well done.  This is my favourite Penhaligon straight after Sartorial.  FB worthy, and an easy blind buy in my books.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1788513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1788513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1745032" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1745032" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zo_smells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1166000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1166000.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zo_smells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Exaltatum/Osmanthus-Noble-49124.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49124.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Osmanthus Noble"title="Osmanthus Noble"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1745032ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1745032" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1166000">zo_smells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-27">01/27/23 09:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>He is very tall, very simply but well dressed in shades of pale blue flannel suit, has salt'n'pepper hair, little on a floppy side even though he is in his very late 40's. <br />
His eyes are gray-blue framed by eyebrows so, so full and naturally sculpted...his cheekbones are laser cut sharp and his beautiful mauve lips so inviting, so fleshy n firm yet juicy and full of promise. <br />
He sways towards you: eyes fixed on yours like his all n only the intention is to seduce you in an instant with almost a faint smile, moving closer and closer that you almost feel his breath on your face...but he passes you somehow and reaches for the handlebar you are standing just too close to on the London Underground Bank branch of Northern Line. <br />
And he smells so, so fresh, warm, somehow glisteningly yummy, like a freshly showered man wearing clothes from yesterday, but without any rankness of BO, just smelling freshly warm and crisp. <br />
Very chick and crisp!<br />
And that little infatuation ends the minute he leaves the train, leaving not a trail of scent behind him, more of a trail of memory and an unfulfilled dream of an affair.<br />
Make what you want of this, but Savoy Steam evokes this imaginary episode for me every time my man wears it.<br />
10/10 in my books!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1745032"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1745032#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1664252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1664252" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1664252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1664252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-12">10/12/22 04:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one passed me by completely this release, Now that I've caught up frankly, I'm not enamored. <br />
I find it's a bit too balanced, as in the elements like eucalyptus, geranium and tea, could've been real players in the composition and are blended, almost beyond recognition. I mean, what a thing to moan about hey?  feel like a right whinger, but this is a disappointing, albeit unique smelling perfume. <br />
So you do get this herbal, puff of spa retreat steam at first, complete with warmth and the sense of humidity in the opening gambit, somewhere between white musk and 'clean' associations, alive with 'products' and then a buttery undercurrent starts to develop. <br />
It's kinda bland, unpopular biscuit left at the bottom of the barrel kind of energy. I don't quite mean that as it sounds. I actually think that it gives some contrast and I'm glad it's there, because otherwise this fragrance would have little to talk about. <br />
It's just not my scene. I simply don't like it. <br />
Make it sharper even, the fact I'm advocating for more Eucalyptus or camphor (not a big fan) should tell you how bored I was with this fragrance, I just wanted to grab it by the lapels and shake some fucking life into it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1664252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1664252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1635654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1635654" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="notnati"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1539631.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="notnati" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Skin-35244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Skin"title="Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1635654ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1635654" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539631">notnati</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-01">09/01/22 03:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very geranium-heavy. All other notes are overpowered by it. We will not be friends. I usually like geranium but it's quite heavy and unpleasant in here - a better option would be Diptyque's Geranium Odorata.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1635654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1635654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1604009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1604009" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hardcandy74"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305840"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1305840.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hardcandy74" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Vengeance-Extreme-13031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vengeance Extreme"title="Vengeance Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1604009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1604009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305840">hardcandy74</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-16">07/16/22 01:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't care for this much on me, but on my partner it is clean and fresh a step away from him but so sexy up close, I can't stop breathing it in! Has been great in all weather (had it 6 or so months now), more of a day than night fragrance, and would repurchase. Does have a sharp top note but otherwise perfect for him.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1604009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1604009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1560613" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1560613" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ksj_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1113640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ksj_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Instant-de-Guerlain-pour-Homme-52.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"title="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1560613ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1560613" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640">Ksj_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-09">05/09/22 17:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First ever blind buy purchase<br />
<br />
<br />
Hopefully this goes well. Especially because I couldnt pass up on it due to the remarkably low price I found it for. I hope this doesnt disappoint. <br />
<br />
<br />
Edit:<br />
<br />
I finally received it and Its just ok to me. I would say its a like more than a love. <br />
<br />
With that being said, make sure you ALWAYS sample first...if you can.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1560613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1560613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1525759" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ParisIsAlwaysAGoodIdea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1059060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ParisIsAlwaysAGoodIdea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1525759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1525759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1059060">ParisIsAlwaysAGoodIdea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-18">03/18/22 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When the summer gets really hot and steamy, this is the only perfume I can wear. I have found that, on me, when I get very hot and sweaty, all my other favourite scents go a bit sour. This one, though, shines right through and (dare I say it?), might even get a little better for the salt and body heat.<br />
<br />
I guess it is that the intended scent, that of a luxury spa, naturally goes with steam and warmth.  On the days that turn my unairconditioned home into a steam-sauna or my commute on the train into time spent in an oven, I still come out "smelling like roses."</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1525759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1525759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1501505" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1501505" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LauraAD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339124"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LauraAD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jeroboam/Ligno-54995.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54995.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ligno"title="Ligno"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1501505ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1501505" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339124">LauraAD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-10">02/10/22 05:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I spray this on I am instantly transported. It opens as tea and eucalyptus with something of freshly squeezed lemonade garnished with sprig of mint. It evokes a memory of sitting in a humid, tropical country, in the blazing sun with a refreshing drink with the ice melting and condensation on the outside of the glass. As it dries down it reminds me of the scent of a luxury spa, even down to managing to smell slightly steamy. The rose is rich but subtle, coming to the fore only after 30 minutes or so, but still with that fizzy lemonade tang over the top.<br />
I really love this, especially for the summer. Bravo, Penhaligon's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1501505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1501505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1492162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1492162" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="naipe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/37974"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.37974.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="naipe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Escape-for-Men-272.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.272.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escape for Men"title="Escape for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1492162ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1492162" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/37974">naipe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-27">01/27/22 08:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Savoy Steam has a lot of notes that appeal to me, but it does not smell at all like I imagined it would. The top notes, very promising, evaporate after a few seconds and barely leave a fresh impression. It is quite bizarre but then I smell 'melted jelly beans', a sweet smell-like rose and red fruits jam that gradually softens while gaining in soapiness and powderiness. I guess the conception of Savoy Steam is like this, a luxury laundry detergent scented with roses but personally I do not get it... in fact I do not identify it as a perfume for a specific gender, I can hardly imagine it on a person despite the interesting concept behind it. For sure a try-before-buy perfume!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1492162"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1492162#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1492014" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821">Cherry_Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-27">01/27/22 04:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh yess. Luxury spa, the most expensive kind. I get loads of cardamom, and a freshness from the eucalyptus but not overwhelming and rose too it's there (a fresh one) but just barely. So fresh and so luxurious and rich at the same time. I've tried this before but never realised I need this :) On other notes whilst I can't pick out the mint rosemary and bergamot individually, all of them add to that herbal freshness, uplifting and fragrant but not earthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
