Its not a note but I get a strong honey scent, but spiced. Hot mint tea with lemon and with honey to sweeten it. Thats the scent I pick up with this one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1488929"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1488929#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1485109" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1485109" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1485109ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1485109" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-17">01/17/22 11:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A HINT OF ROSE<br />
<br />
It's spring, and you're at a spa strolling on the bucolic grounds, and a soft, gentle breeze carries a hint of a nearby rose garden. <br />
<br />
Such a lovely, fresh, fragrance. <br />
<br />
ps. Unisex, but leans a touch feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1485109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1485109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1457069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1457069" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1457069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1457069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834">MaquiLab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-04">12/04/21 01:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Exquisite! This is a true pampering scent, enveloping in a SPA luxury with its fresh rosy aura. The eucalyptus adds a surreal dimension and makes me want to plunge into a bathtub filled with this elixir!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1457069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1457069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1456383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1456383" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mayamaya80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mayamaya80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1456383ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1456383" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402168">mayamaya80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-02">12/02/21 21:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is indeed a unique scent. It sometimes reminds me of a really nice bowl of potpourri in some high end spa, but not exactly. I can prominently smell the steam and pepper and rosemary at first spray.  It also has that very mild, not off-putting, medicinal herbal scent. Then it becomes dry, somewhat powdery and woody. It smells very light and translucent. It does have rose but I get only hints of it. It's very beautiful.  It doesn't project well and it sits very close to the skin but I have yet to try it during hot humid weather. But I think it's something appropriate all year round and is very pleasant and won't offend anyone. That is if they come close enough to smell you. It smells better and lasts longer on skin than on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1456383"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1456383#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1426195" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1426195" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pilikins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.203182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pilikins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1426195ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1426195" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203182">Pilikins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-11">10/11/21 05:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very unusual fragrance, both aromatic and floral. It starts out with a herbal and citric accord that is refreshing and not commonplace at all. The eucalyptus note is not intrusive as I normally find it - it usually reminds me of cough medicine but here, it blends with the pepper to create warmth which contrasts with the cooler herbal notes. I love this phase which is calming and refreshing. Then in comes the rose, gradually blooming with increasing sweetness but like a living rose rather than a jammy one. The rose combines with the herbal notes to create a completely unique perfume, which is very slightly soapy. In the drydown, the rose blends with the resins and becomes warmed by spices, This phase reminds me of spiced rose milk and is comforting and warm. Overall, this perfumes is like a spa retreat in a bottle. Unisex leaning feminine, sillage moderate, longevity 8 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1426195"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1426195#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1394632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1394632" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nebularonic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357011"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357011.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nebularonic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1394632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1394632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); It sits beautifully on my skin and I love the intriguing aroma it projects.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1394632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1394632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1379474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327002">Flippi1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-25">06/25/21 05:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This really is a Does what it says on the bottle kind of scent ! Like freshly laundered towels at a 5 star hotel spa . Quality ingredients shine through natural not synthetic, not exciting or deep but still a rewarding wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1365703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1365703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1356458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356458" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="witch_x3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="witch_x3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jessica-Simpson/Fancy-4094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fancy"title="Fancy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254041">witch_x3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-08">06/08/21 05:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is really unique and lovely. It is very much a unisex scent. It has a clean musky warm feel to it without being soapy or fresh. Spraying this feels like a warm towel in a lovely steamy spa. It's lightly sweet at times but mostly aromatic. This is one of those scents that I feel everyone would like as it isn't too in your face and could easily seem like you aren't wearing anything at all and that's just 'how you smell!' I think this would be great in all seasons but be best from Spring to Fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1356458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1356458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1348291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1348291" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J350"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J350" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1348291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1348291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660">J350</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-23">05/23/21 18:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is mixture of an aromatic and ozonic scent that reminds me so much of a high end spa. The eucalyptus, mint, geranium is very much prominent on the first few minutes but as it settles down then the rose, benzoin and incense notes comes in as well as amber which then makes it sweet, woody and aromatic. <br />
<br />
I would say this is a perfect all year round scent and tends to be more masculine, albeit a little on the pricier side. <br />
<br />
A complex mixture of notes but the bottle screams simplicity. I understand that The Savoy Hotel in London uses this as their in house toiletries and with that, youll immediately think: high end, class, sophisticated and extravagant. However, I do believe in less is more and that is exactly what this scent says, even with the design of the bottle. <br />
<br />
If this was a person, Savoy Steams personality will present himself as a simple yet classy and graceful! <br />
<br />
Overall rating: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1348291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1348291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1297392" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1297392" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mohsen95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.995817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mohsen95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1297392ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1297392" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817">mohsen95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-23">02/23/21 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1297392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1297392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1292462" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1292462" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ingeneuxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1280821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ingeneuxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Rose-Of-No-Man-s-Land-31931.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31931.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Of No Man's Land"title="Rose Of No Man's Land"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1292462ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1292462" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280821">ingeneuxo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-14">02/14/21 06:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>-Opens with clean, rosemary notes; reminiscent of an expensive spa.<br />
-Inspired by steam baths in Savoy, back in olden day London. <br />
-Not fbw. (-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1292462"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1292462#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1244818" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1244818" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ladybird1000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ladybird1000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1244818ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1244818" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263544">ladybird1000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-04">11/04/20 15:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to like this fragrance. The name was intriguing and the idea of steam in a bottle sounded very exotic. With a first spray you can indeed smell the steam, which is pleasantly accompanied by cardamon, eucalyptus and pink pepper. It is very refreshing and calming at the same time. It makes you think of the good times: summer time laziness, relaxing bath and even custard buns and vanilla ice cream. It's gentle so you want to spray more and more...and more. And this is when you go wrong. In about 10 minutes it dries into a suffocating rose, you feel like a scarf is tightening on your neck, it's nauseating and headache evoking. You start to regret the last few splashes. However, you try not to panic and wait for the base notes, and ...nothing. The rose is aggressive, it penetrates your nose right into your brain. <br />
<br />
The rose note in the Savoy Steam is not a typical rose note. Usually rose fragrances make me think of my grandmother who used to keep rose soaps in an old, beautifully carved black wooden cabinet. She would cover the cabinet with an embroidered cloth and keep a few roses from her garden in a small vase on top of it. The whole room smelled of love and warmth evoking roses. The rose note in this fragrance is citrus-sour and thorny. It's like being criticized for something you did not intend. <br />
<br />
I suspect that if you like citrus and rose, you might like this fragrance. It is definitely unusual and initially, it does smell like steam, which I am still mesmerized by. Purchasing this fragrance was definitely an interesting experience, I have been trying to crack the shocking difference between the top and the middle notes all day. The rose in this case definitely broke my heart so I will be divorcing myself from this fragrance ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1244818"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1244818#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1195283" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1195283" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meiraine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245189"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1245189.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meiraine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1195283ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1195283" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245189">meiraine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-02">07/02/20 14:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is aptly named. It does evoke the image of a rose-scented, steamy bath. This is my favorite comforting, "clean skin" sort of scent.<br />
<br />
The main notes I do get are rose, cardamom, and pepper. Rose notes are hit or miss for me but the rose in this is never cloying. There is a sort of sweetness and hint of powderiness that is reminiscent of skin and soap (in a good way).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1195283"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1195283#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1193499" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1193499" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maybelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/623397"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.623397.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maybelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Tyrannosaurus-Rex-51353.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51353.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tyrannosaurus Rex"title="Tyrannosaurus Rex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1193499ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1193499" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/623397">Maybelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-27">06/27/20 12:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a perfect scent for a humid day in summer. It envelops you in rose but it feels fresh and clean. I enjoy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1193499"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1193499#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1153713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1153713" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heidii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/16194"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.16194.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heidii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nobile-1942/Anonimo-Veneziano-10774.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10774.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Anonimo Veneziano"title="Anonimo Veneziano"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1153713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1153713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/16194">heidii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-03-10">03/10/20 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i like the opening of this, smells very spa like. Almost if they put a few drops of black oud  by kilian in a hottub (it has a very similar piramid: incense-rose-geranium-pink pepper-greennes(patchouli/papyrus in black oud)). After a while it dries down to a more generic floral-vanilla-musk with some steam and pink pepper which makes it almost identical to kenzo amour indian holi</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1153713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1153713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1018692" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1018692" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Samamtha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/905118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.905118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Samamtha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-and-James/Nirvana-Bourbon-40269.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40269.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nirvana Bourbon"title="Nirvana Bourbon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1018692ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1018692" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/905118">Samamtha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-09">01/09/19 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm loving this EDP! For whatever reason, by wearing it I'm transported back in time ca 1930, on a steam boat - something like an exotic cruise trip on the river Nile with Agatha Christie (or indeed Hercule Poirot)! It's a scent that captures my idea of good old days when the upper crust dressed impeccably to the nines on their vacation/cruise. Elegant, clean, beautifully classy, ever-so-slightly sweet. This is also a truly unisex scent too, not too sharp, not too sweet; it's the best blend of so many different elements. Oh it's exquisitely delightful!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1018692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1018692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1018395" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1018395" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosequeen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169399"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169399.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosequeen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Raphael/Replique-5132.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5132.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Replique"title="Replique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1018395ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1018395" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169399">rosequeen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-08">01/08/19 19:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been wearing Penhaligon's Savoy Steam EDP all day today and reveling in it.  I really like it and have wondered why it gets so many negative reviews.  I've come to the conclusion that few people connect in a positive way with steam.  <br />
<br />
I don't know what else they could have called it though.  It smells like a steam bath after someone has sprayed a 30's or 40's mens' rose scented cologne.  So that really limits the number of people who have this association.  Even I wasn't alive in the 1930's or early 1940's, and Penhaligon's target market certainly wasn't either.  <br />
<br />
I wonder how they described this fragrance in their "concept" meetings at Penhaligon's, which they must have when they're deciding which of their perfumers latest creations to promote.  Here's my take.  The original description of Savoy Steam did associate it with the Savoy Hotel, but I suspect it was without their permission because that verbiage was dropped pretty soon afterwards.  <br />
<br />
What I think Penhaligon's was trying to evoke was a vision of the interior of the Savoy Hotel for people who have never actually been inside.  Think of a white or light grey marble steam room, with white marble flooring with those little square or hexagon shaped tiles from the 1930's, and maybe windows high up in the walls so you can see the light grey sky down by the Thames.  Savoy Steam is not a sunshine and roses perfume; it's definitely a cold grey day fragrance. (That alone must disappoint many buyers.)<br />
<br />
Ok, a vision that would appeal to a limited number of people.  Might not even be an age thing; the Savoy has been used as a backdrop for several mysteries and spy thrillers. Maybe Penhaligon's thought they'd reach that market too, people from 25-95 who read a lot, fantasize a lot, look at the sky on grey days, and love wearing an unusual rose scented perfume.  It's not a stretch; after all, Penhaligon's thought there was a market for a sea of odd perfumes with snobby names sold in bottles with tops resembling weird chess pieces.  (Who has time to keep track of them?)<br />
<br />
But I enjoy wearing Savoy Steam EDP anyway, and hope it stays around a little longer.  I sprayed it on 9 hours ago and can still smell it.  All it takes is the ability and desire to imagine a marble steam room.  (Savoy Steam will probably not help people who use perfume to attract someone.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1018395"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1018395#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1004910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1004910" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="prada_man23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="prada_man23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1004910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1004910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172637">prada_man23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-28">11/28/18 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice, pleasant, uninspiring. Reminds me of burberry brit for men and voyage d'hermes. Scent interpretation of a white button up shirt. Good if you are a waiter/waitress or going to church or a baby shower. Someone wrote a good scent for a senior citizen and i can see that fitting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="1004910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=1004910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent901569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc901569" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="robynheartsscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="robynheartsscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/L-Eau-de-L-Artisan-1264.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1264.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau de L'Artisan"title="L'Eau de L'Artisan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma901569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd901569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112040">robynheartsscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-01-17">01/17/18 07:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A clean, sunny and sweet rose with a warm cardamom and incense base. Sadly I don't get any eucalyptus which would really pull me into the 'steam bath', and yes, it's uncomplex and linear, but it's so uplifting I can't help but adore it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="901569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=901569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent859312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc859312" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gtabasso"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.132621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gtabasso" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/True-Lust-Rayon-Violet-De-Ses-Yeux-29397.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29397.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="True Lust Rayon Violet De Ses Yeux"title="True Lust Rayon Violet De Ses Yeux"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma859312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd859312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132621">gtabasso</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-08">09/08/17 11:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>on me this is interesting: aquatic/tea, smoke, ambery vanilla; very light and airy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="859312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=859312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent847387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc847387" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BellaX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067824"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1067824.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BellaX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Jacobs/Decadence-31226.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31226.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Decadence"title="Decadence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma847387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd847387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067824">BellaX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-08-02">08/02/17 15:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a tester of this in edp version and a tester of Malabah and to me they are so similar! Does anyone else think they are? I have had both on (different arms) this evening to really try to smell the seperate notes. First of all I really like Savoy Steam, I am not so fond of Malabah so there are some very subtle but important differences. I like the fact that Savoy Steam is more citrusy and a little bit fresher. To me it's also slightly softer and not quite as spicy as Malabah. The cardamom and the rosemary comes out strong. I think that it must be the incense that gives it a softer, gentler smell. Savoy Steam is rather lovely, unusual and very wearable for both women and men.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="847387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=847387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent828411" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc828411" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emresh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028609"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="emresh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="My Way"title="My Way"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma828411ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd828411" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028609">emresh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-02">06/02/17 00:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ii fell in love with this scent - cardamom and rose -ethereal and smart and blissful. The sample smells less intense. I actually bought this after loving the sample. Totally worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="828411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=828411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent827680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc827680" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vinyl_junky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vinyl_junky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/GFT-5004.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5004.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="GFT"title="GFT"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma827680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd827680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736">vinyl_junky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-31">05/31/17 00:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As some reviews below have noted, the EDP and the EDC are listed separately in the database, as they should be - both fragrances are very different. I have only the EDP, received as a sample with my last purchase. <br />
<br />
I was expecting something similar to Hammam Boquet, but was severely disappointed. Savoy Steam is nowhere close. It's a light, slightly sweet, rose floral. That's it. It's pretty one-dimensional, you basically get a whiff of rose, and that's about it. <br />
<br />
As per the salesman at the store, the "Savoy" in the name comes from a tie up they have with the Savoy hotel in London (couldn't find any information to support this). The the "Steam" refers to the steam process by which the rose is extracted, which preserves all of the essential oils. But hey, a rose by any other name...<br />
<br />
Longevity is poor, I get around an hour and this is a skin scent on me. <br />
<br />
For the USD 175 you'd have to shell out for 100ml of this, you can pick up around 4.5 litres of rosewater from the nearest chemist which will give you pretty much the same scent with about the same performance. I don't think I'll be investing in a full bottle...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="827680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=827680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent821847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc821847" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BeautyMeow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1044814"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1044814.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BeautyMeow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mendittorosa/Le-Mat-25138.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25138.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Mat"title="Le Mat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma821847ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd821847" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1044814">BeautyMeow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-11">05/11/17 16:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have tried both the EdC and the EdP versions of this and I must say I GREATLY prefer the EdP. You get better longevity, and it just smells a lot better. I usually like Colognes for the summertime, but the cologne version of this was like lightly scented water. <br />
<br />
Now I LOVE the EdP version. It was pretty much love at first sniff. Spicy, fresh and slightly sweet. Incredibly refreshing, perfect for the heat and humidity. It just hit all the right spots too! I wore through my samples in a week and was like OK need to purchase a full bottle right now!! I get pretty decent sillage, and longevity isn't to bad. Overall I am very excited to own this, and wear it this summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="821847"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=821847#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent808117" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc808117" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marco Chau"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/399450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.399450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marco Chau" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Muscs-Koublai-Khan-4090.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4090.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Muscs Koublai Khan"title="Muscs Koublai Khan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma808117ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd808117" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/399450">Marco Chau</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-04-01">04/01/17 06:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As the Cologne and Eau de Parfum versions of Savoy Steam are so different, they should be separated into two especially because their notes are quite different. The notes listed above are all messed up and totally useless to those who want to know how these two fragrances smell. Ratings for longevity and sillage are meaningless. If anyone want to know how they smell, please go to a Penhaligon's boutique or seller. Reviews here are not going to help.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="808117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=808117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent804145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc804145" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="F2097"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="F2097" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma804145ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd804145" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212">F2097</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-03-20">03/20/17 15:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nope. Was quite excited by the thought of this as I find Hammam Bouquet enjoyable. The perfume of this is boring weak sauce. There is no bite, it's so flat. I've not tried the cologne yet and I'm hoping for better as it has different notes on their website.<br />
<br />
This perfume is well balanced and not unpleasant in any way. It's a light, balanced floral and some people will enjoy that. However it is so generic and flat. A general peachy rose smell that inspires no emotion and makes you feel nothing. It goes in no particular direction, there is no hook or reason to want this scent in your life. <br />
<br />
If this was a cheap room spray or candle it would be an acceptable scent, not what I'd choose but I could accept it's existence. <br />
<br />
For a perfume that is supposed to hark back to Hammam or for something that costs over 130, Savoy Steam is a disgrace.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="804145"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=804145#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent802041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc802041" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Truffles_L"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.995517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Truffles_L" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Fiore-d-Ulivo-6311.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6311.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fiore d'Ulivo"title="Fiore d'Ulivo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma802041ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd802041" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995517">Truffles_L</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-03-14">03/14/17 04:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore my edp sample twice so far. It is clean, spicy and refreshing. It is not a strong fragrance. Would be great for a daytime outing or work. It is quite unisex. For the person who asked how it is being tested...Penhaligon's gave me a sample when I purchased something else this weekend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="802041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=802041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent799679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc799679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MonkeyFonics"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051734"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MonkeyFonics" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma799679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd799679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051734">MonkeyFonics</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-03-07">03/07/17 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just received my Savoy Steam EDC, and wow! It's a 200ml bottle of nothing! There is almost nothing to say about it, I simply can't smell it - and I'm not a fan of big scents. The notes I can detect are nothing like Hammam Bouquet, but the EDC never really sounded like it would be except for the marketing blurb. To me it's like sniffing an empty glass of vodka &amp; tonic and trying to establish what was in there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="799679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=799679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent774598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc774598" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Prince Barry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Prince Barry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BeauFort-London/Iron-Duke-46598.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46598.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iron Duke"title="Iron Duke"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma774598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd774598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924">Prince Barry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-12-27">12/27/16 00:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'd love to know how people have cast votes on this already. It isn't launched until March 2017.<br />
<br />
According to the info that I read from the Perfume Society, it's a lighter, more modern version of Hammam Bouquet, hence the reference to steam baths in the name.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="42702"comment_id="774598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Savoy-Steam-42702.html?ccid=774598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
